Article Title: India Cricket Team qualification scenario: How can Team India reach T20 World Cup 2026 semi-final?
Article Text:
India's Jasprit Bumrah celebrates with teammates (PTI Photo/Gurinder Osan)

Why India are in deep trouble | T20 World Cup 2026 | India vs South Africa



India T20 World Cup Qualification Scenario

Scenario 1 – India win both matches

Scenario 2 – India win one match

Team India’s hopes of reaching the T20 World Cup 2026 semi-finals have taken a serious hit after a crushing 76-run defeat to South Africa in their opening Super 8 fixture in Ahmedabad on Sunday. Led by Suryakumar Yadav , India were thoroughly outplayed as the Proteas dominated both innings.South Africa, after opting to bat first, posted a commanding 187/7. David Miller anchored the innings with a fluent 63, while Dewald Brevis provided momentum with a brisk 45. Despite Jasprit Bumrah ’s impressive spell of 3/15, India were unable to prevent South Africa from finishing strongly.The chase unravelled quickly. India never settled into any rhythm and were eventually bowled out for just 111. Marco Jansen was the chief destroyer with four wickets, sealing a comprehensive win and inflicting major damage on India’s Net Run Rate, which now stands at -3.800.The defeat leaves India in a must-win situation. They need victories in both of their remaining Super 8 matches against West Indies and Zimbabwe to ensure qualification for the Final Four. Even then, scenarios could complicate matters.If India secure wins in both fixtures, they will finish with four points.In most cases, that should be enough to qualify. However, complications arise if South Africa win only one of their remaining matches and the winner of the West Indies vs Zimbabwe clash also defeats South Africa. In that situation, three teams could end up on four points, pushing qualification to Net Run Rate calculations. Ideally for India, South Africa winning both of their remaining matches would simplify the equation and reduce reliance on NRR.If India manage just one win, they will require South Africa to win all their remaining games. Additionally, India’s sole victory must come against the winner of the West Indies vs Zimbabwe contest. That outcome would leave India, West Indies and Zimbabwe level on two points each, once again making Net Run Rate the deciding factor.India now find themselves under immense pressure. A defeat alone may not have been disastrous, but the scale of the loss and the severe blow to their Net Run Rate have left their campaign hanging by a thread.
Article Summary: India lost to south africa by 76 runs in their opening super 8 fixture. The defeat leaves india in a must-win situation. They need victories in both of their remaining super 8 matches against west indies and zimbabwe to ensure qualification for the final four. But scenarios could complicate matters.

Article Title: Times Internet Half Marathon: Delhi Takes to the Streets on March 29
Article Text:
.

Four Distances, One Starting Line

Early Bird Offer ends on 3 March -

Why Delhi Is Paying Attention

A Runner-First Experience in the Heart of the City

March 29, 2026, is not just another Sunday on the calendar. It is the day the Times Internet Delhi Half Marathon moves from announcement to action, taking over the heart of the city with four race categories designed for runners at every stage.Across Delhi, preparations are already underway. Registrations are open , group and corporate entries are gaining momentum, and training plans are beginning to take shape. What starts as a simple sign-up quickly turns into structure. Morning alarms are reset. Weekends revolve around distance. Vague fitness intentions are replaced by measurable goals.In a city where time is always scarce, a fixed race date has a way of creating accountability like little else can. The Times Internet Delhi Half Marathon 2026 reflects the diversity of Delhi’s running community, offering clear pathways for both first-time participants and seasoned runners.The 21.1K Half Marathon is the headline event, demanding disciplined preparation, steady mileage and mental resilience. For many, it represents a defining personal milestone.The 10K Timed Run offers competitive intensity within a shorter training cycle, appealing to runners who want performance and official timing without committing to a longer build.The 5K Timed Run serves as an accessible entry into organised racing, introducing participants to pacing and race-day execution in a formal setting.The 2K Fun Run widens participation to families, students and senior citizens, ensuring the event extends beyond competition and becomes a shared city experience.Distance running has steadily become the fitness discipline of choice across the capital. The reason is simple: a race date creates commitment. Once March 29 is fixed, preparation stops being optional.This mirrors how the city already operates, through structured goals, consistent effort and outcomes earned over time. Students, professionals, entrepreneurs, parents and experienced runners all understand what it means to commit to a target and follow through.That shift is already visible. Running groups are growing, weekend long runs are becoming routine, and friends and families are registering together. Fitness is moving from a personal intention to a shared standard as race day approaches. The Times Internet Delhi Half Marathon 2026 is designed as a professionally managed race environment that allows runners to focus purely on performance. With timed categories, clear race management and organised on-ground support, it provides a safe, goal-driven space for individuals and communities to prioritise fitness in a meaningful way.On March 29, Delhi runs. Secure your early bird spot now. (Ends on 3 March)
Article Summary: The times internet delhi half marathon 2026 takes place on march 29, 2026. The 21.1k half marathon is the headline event, demanding disciplined preparation, steady mileage and mental resilience. The 10k timed run offers competitive intensity within a shorter training cycle, appealing to runners who want performance and official timing without committing to a longer build.

Boston Celtics vs Phoenix Suns Head-to-head outlook

Boston Celtics vs Phoenix Suns Key matchups (February 24, 2026)

Theplay theat Footprint Center on. This game looks different from what it could have been earlier in the season.Both teams are missing key players. That changes how the game will be played. It is less about star power and more about which team can adjust better and get enough from its rotation.Boston will be without Jayson Tatum, who is still out after Achilles surgery. Jaylen Brown has also been ruled out with a knee contusion. That leaves a large gap in scoring and ball handling.Max Shulga is unavailable due to a G League assignment. Amari Williams is listed as doubtful.Phoenix also has several players out. Devin Booker remains sidelined with a hip strain. Dillon Brooks is out with a fractured hand. Cole Anthony is not with the team. Jordan Goodwin and Haywood Highsmith are also out. Grayson Allen is listed as questionable.With Tatum, Brown, and Booker not playing, both teams will rely on secondary options.Boston enters the game with a 37-19 record. They are second in the Eastern Conference and trail Cleveland.Phoenix is around the .500 mark in the Western Conference. The team is still in the playoff mix after recent roster changes that included adding Jalen Green and Dillon Brooks.Boston has been steady on both ends of the floor. They average 115.3 points per game and allow 108.0. Their shooting numbers are among the better ones in the league, and they do not turn the ball over often.Phoenix has had issues on defense. In recent games, they are allowing 126.0 points. Their scoring has held up, but efficiency and rebounding have been inconsistent.Boston has an edge in rebounding and ball control. That could matter in a game where both teams are short-handed.Boston has a slight edge in past regular-season meetings. These games have often been lower scoring.Phoenix usually plays better at home, but injuries make this harder to predict.Boston will need production from Derrick White and Payton Pritchard. They will have to handle more of the scoring and playmaking.For Phoenix, Jalen Green takes on a bigger role without Booker.Inside, Phoenix could use Nick Richards or Mark Williams. Boston will rely on Nikola Vucevic. Bench players like Baylor Scheierman and Royce O’Neale may also have a larger role.This game will likely come down to which team executes better with its available players.
Article Summary: Boston enters the game with a 37-19 record. They are second in the eastern conference and trail cleveland. Phoenix is around the.500 mark in the western conference. The team is still in the playoff mix after recent roster changes that included adding jalen green and dillon brooks.

England T20 World Cup upcoming Matches

Date Opponent Venue Time (Local) Feb 22 Sri Lanka Pallekele 3:00 PM Feb 24 Pakistan Pallekele 7:00 PM Feb 27 New Zealand Colombo (RPS) 7:00 PM

NEW DELHI: The Super 8 stage of the ICC Men’s T20 World Cup 2026 is set, with eight teams confirming their place in the next round after an action-packed league phase. India topped Group A with a flawless 4-0 record, while Pakistan sealed qualification with a dominant 102-run win over Namibia.Sri Lanka and Zimbabwe advanced from Group B, with Australia knocked out after Zimbabwe’s washed-out match against Ireland handed them crucial points.England and West Indies progressed from Group C, while New Zealand and South Africa secured the top two spots in Group D. The eight teams will now be split into two Super 8 groups, with the top two sides from each group advancing to the semi-finals.The Super 8 fixtures will be played across venues in India and Sri Lanka, including Ahmedabad, Chennai, Delhi, Mumbai, Colombo, and Pallekele. High-profile clashes such as India vs South Africa, India vs West Indies, and Pakistan vs England are expected to draw massive global attention.Super 8 so far: India have lost their opening Super 8 game to South Africa by 76 runs, England have beaten Sri Lanka by 51 runs, while the match between Pakistan and New Zealand was washed out, with both teams receiving one point each.The 2026 T20 World Cup will see Ahmedabad host the final, with Kolkata and Mumbai confirmed as the venues for the two semifinals. Colombo has been named as an alternative venue for the final and one semifinal, if Pakistan secure a spot in the top four.
Article Summary: The super 8 stage of the icc men’s t20 world cup 2026 is set. India topped group a with a flawless 4-0 record, while pakistan sealed qualification with a dominant 102-run win over namibia. England and west indies progressed from group c, while new zealand and south africa secured the top two spots in group d. the super 8 fixtures will be played across venues in india and sri lanka.

Pros and cons for both teams

Thehave been linked to a possible move for. as they look to improve their lineup for the 2026 season. With Miguel Cabrera no longer playing, the team needs a hitter who can take on a central role in the offense.The idea of this trade is still speculative, but it reflects where Detroit stands. The team has built a strong group of young players and may now look to add an established name. Bringing in Tatis would signal a shift from rebuilding to trying to compete.In this scenario, Fernando Tatis Jr, 27, would move to Detroit Tigers. He is signed through 2034, with his salary rising to $36 million per year. Any deal would depend on him agreeing to waive his no-trade clause.San Diego Padres would receive Max Clark, Kevin McGonigle, Jackson Jobe, and Colt Keith. Clark hit .271 with 14 home runs in the minors in 2025. McGonigle batted .305 with 19 home runs. Jobe had a 4.22 ERA in limited major league action. Keith hit .256 with 13 home runs in the majors. Detroit would be giving up multiple young players with upside.Fernando Tatis Jr would likely play right field and join Riley Greene and Kerry Carpenter.His 2025 numbers, 25 home runs, 32 stolen bases, and 111 runs, address areas where Detroit needs more production.He would also become the main name in the lineup. The team already has players like Spencer Torkelson and Gleyber Torres, and adding Tatis would raise expectations. With Tarik Skubal leading the rotation, Detroit would be aiming to compete in the division.For the San Diego Padres, this type of deal is about roster balance and long-term planning. Moving Fernando Tatis Jr would reduce a large financial commitment and bring in younger players.The return adds depth around Xander Bogaerts, Manny Machado, and Jackson Merrill. Jobe would help the pitching group, while Clark and McGonigle add hitting potential. It also gives the team more flexibility as it continues to build around prospects like Ethan Salas.The numbers show Fernando Tatis Jr ahead of Detroit’s current outfield in power and speed.For Detroit Tigers, the move adds a proven hitter and more speed to the lineup. It also gives the team a recognizable face. The downside is losing top prospects and taking on a long contract, along with some injury risk.For San Diego Padres, the trade brings in several young players and reduces payroll pressure. The risk is giving up a player who is already performing at a high level. The return depends on how those players develop.Also read: MLB trade rumors: Los Angeles Dodgers predicted to land $300 million Detroit Tigers superstar Tarik Skubal in potential deadline blockbuster Detroit Tigers would be taking a direct approach by trading future talent for a proven player. If Tatis performs as expected, it improves their chances in the division. San Diego Padres would be focusing on depth and flexibility, with the outcome tied to the development of the players they receive.
Article Summary: Fernando tatis jr would likely play right field and join riley greene and kerry carpenter. San diego padres would receive max clark, kevin mcgonigle, jackson jobe, and colt keith. Any deal would depend on him agreeing to waive his no-trade clause.

Article Title: Why Jake Guentzel turned down Donald Trump’s State of the Union invitation as the US men’s hockey team visit White House
Article Text:
Jake Guentzel rejects Donald Trump invitation (Getty Images and X)

Jake Guentzel skips White House visit and State of the Union to focus on Lightning return



Jake Guentzel has declined President Donald Trump's invitation to visit White House. Guentzel had just helped deliver one of the most meaningful wins in American hockey history. Yet while his teammates flew to Washington to be honored, the gold medal hero stayed behind, far from the spotlight. The decision was not about avoiding the moment. It was about returning to the grind that defines players at his level.Fresh off the dramatic Olympic triumph, the American forward chose routine over ceremony. While the celebration shifted to the White House and the State of the Union address, his focus had already turned back to the NHL season. For Guentzel, the next game mattered just as much as the last victory.Jake Guentzel was not on the government aircraft that carried most of Team USA from Miami to Washington. Instead, he remained in Florida, with the Tampa Bay Lightning confirming he stayed back as the club resumed its push toward the Stanley Cup playoffs. The timing was tight. The Olympic break had ended, and NHL responsibilities were calling.His absence stood out, especially after his role in securing gold at the Milan Cortina Olympic Games.The United States defeated Canada 2 to 1 in overtime, with Jack Hughes scoring the winner. It was the country’s first Olympic gold in men’s hockey since 1980, ending a 46 year wait that had lingered over generations of players.Donald Trump welcomed the players who attended. “I recognize every one of you. I know every one of you,” he said while greeting them. He smiled as he shook hands and added, “Big guys.”Still, Guentzel was not alone in missing the visit. Several players, including Brock Nelson, Kyle Connor, Jake Oettinger, and Jackson LaCombe, were also absent. Various reasons surfaced, ranging from family time to travel schedules. Quinn Hughes, who did attend, summed up the excitement from those present. “It’s not something you get to do every Tuesday,” he said. “It’s going to be special for us.”Guentzel won the Stanley Cup with the Pittsburgh Penguins in 2017 and became the first University of Nebraska Omaha alum to win an Olympic medal. Yet he has rarely lingered in celebration.The Lightning now need him back. The season is moving fast, and contenders cannot afford pauses. Gold medals are forever, but so is the pursuit of the next one.
Article Summary: Jake guentzel declined president donald trump's invitation to visit white house. The pittsburgh penguins forward was not on the government aircraft that carried most of team usa from miami to washington. The tampa bay lightning confirmed he stayed back as the club resumed its push toward the stanley cup playoffs.

Oklahoma City Thunder vs Houston Raptors Game outlook (February 24, 2026)

Theon February 24, 2026. Oklahoma City leads the Western Conference with a 44-14 record. Toronto is 33-23 and holding a playoff spot in the East.Both teams are dealing with injuries. Oklahoma City is missing key starters, while Toronto has several players listed as questionable. Even so, both sides still have enough depth to keep the game close.The Oklahoma City Thunder will be without Shai Gilgeous-Alexander, who is out with an abdominal strain. Jalen Williams is also out with a hamstring injury. Ajay Mitchell remains sidelined with abdominal and ankle issues.Chet Holmgren is questionable with back spasms. Alex Caruso (left ankle) and Aaron Wiggins (right hip) are also listed as questionable. Thomas Sorber is out with a torn ACL.The roster remains mostly unchanged from last season, with the team continuing to rely on its young core.Jakob Poeltl is out with a lower back strain. Chucky Hepburn is also out with a knee issue and is currently on a G League assignment.Immanuel Quickley (ankle), Ja’Kobe Walter (hip), and Collin Murray-Boyles (thumb) are all questionable.That leaves Scottie Barnes and RJ Barrett as the main available options.Toronto continues to build around Barnes, with added scoring support from younger players like Gradey Dick and Jonathan Mogbo.Oklahoma City has been one of the most efficient teams this season. The team scores 119.5 points per game and allows 107.7. It also ranks among the top teams in steals and blocks.Toronto averages 113.7 points per game. The team relies more on ball movement and rebounding, with 29.2 assists per game.Oklahoma City has a slight edge in rebounding. Toronto ranks higher in assists.Recent meetings have gone in Oklahoma City’s favor. The team has stayed consistent with its lineup and performance.This game will be played at Scotiabank Arena.Oklahoma City will need to adjust without Gilgeous-Alexander and Williams. Holmgren’s availability could affect their defense inside. Caruso could take on a larger role if he plays.Toronto will look to use Barnes and Barrett to carry the offense. If Quickley is available, it will help with ball handling and playmaking.The game may come down to execution. Oklahoma City’s defense has been steady all season. Toronto will try to control the game through passing and rebounding.
Article Summary: Oklahoma city leads the western conference with a 44-14 record. Toronto is 33-23 and holding a playoff spot in the east. Oklahoma city is missing key starters, while toronto has several players listed as questionable. Both sides still have enough depth to keep the game close.

Article Title: Rj Princy Parikh: After rape threats and body-shaming, influencer RJ Princy Parikh deletes viral T20 World Cup reel with David Miller
Article Text:
Princy Parikh with South African batter David Miller (Screengrabs)

Indian cricket team arrives for nets in Chennai

NEW DELHI: After India’s heavy loss to South Africa in the T20 World Cup 2026, a video posted by social media influencer RJ Princy Parikh with South African batter David Miller went viral.In the clip, Parikh was seen circling Miller, with the caption “David Miller! What a player” and the on-screen line “I thought we were friends, David.”Soon after, Parikh claimed she started receiving serious online abuse, including rape threats and body-shaming comments. Because of this, she deleted the video from Facebook but kept it on Instagram, and said she plans to file a police complaint over the threats.South Africa crushed India by 76 runs in their first Super Eight match of the T20 World Cup 2026 at the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad, leaving India in a must-win situation for their remaining two games to reach the semifinals.Chasing 188, India were bowled out for just 111 in 18.5 overs, ending their 12-match T20 World Cup winning streak.India’s chase collapsed early, with Ishan Kishan and Tilak Varma falling cheaply. Suryakumar Yadav and Abhishek Sharma tried to rebuild, but Sharma was dismissed in the fifth over.Washington Sundar and Yadav also failed to build partnerships, and although Hardik Pandya and Shivam Dube added 35 runs, regular wickets kept India under pressure.Dube’s dismissal for 42 sealed India’s fate.South Africa’s bowlers dominated, with Marco Jansen taking 4/22, Keshav Maharaj 3/24, and Lungi Ngidi conceding just 15 runs in four overs.Earlier, David Miller anchored South Africa’s innings with a match-winning 63 off 35 balls after they were 20/3, sharing a 97-run stand with Dewald Brevis (45 off 29). Tristan Stubbs added a quick 44* to help South Africa post 187/7. Jasprit Bumrah took 3/15.
Article Summary: Princy parikh receives rape threats after posting video of herself with david miller. South africa crushed india by 76 runs in their first super eight match of t20 world cup 2026. India were bowled out for just 111 in 18.5 overs, ending their 12-match winning streak.

Article Title: T20 World Cup 2026 Super 8 Points Table: India's road to the final four gets complicated
Article Text:
South Africa's players celebrate the wicket of India's captain Suryakumar Yadav (AP Photo/Ajit Solanki)

Why India are in deep trouble | T20 World Cup 2026 | India vs South Africa

The Super 8 stage of the T20 World Cup has begun with dramatic shifts in momentum, as both groups take early shape following a series of decisive results.In Group 1, West Indies hold the top spot after a commanding 107-run win over Zimbabwe on Monday. Windies also have a stunning net run rate of +5.350 after the record win - their biggest in the T20 World Cup history. The big defeat left Zimbabwe at the bottom of the group.South Africa now occupy the second spot after a commanding 76-run win over defending champions India at the Narendra Modi Stadium in Ahmedabad. The Proteas have two points and a formidable Net Run Rate of +3.800. It was a statement performance from the side that lost to India in the 2024 final. After posting 187/7, powered by David Miller’s 63 off 35 balls, South Africa bowled India out for just 111 in 18.5 overs. Left-arm pacer Marco Jansen starred with figures of 4-22 in 3.5 overs, ending India’s 12-match winning streak in T20 World Cups.India, meanwhile, are placed third following their heavy defeat and a damaging NRR of -3.800, leaving their semi-final hopes under immediate pressure.Group 2 has also seen clear early movement. England lead the standings after a 51-run victory over Sri Lanka in Pallekele.They have two points and a healthy NRR of +2.550. Phil Salt anchored England’s innings with a composed 62 off 40 balls, guiding them to 146-9, while Will Jacks added late impetus and later struck three wickets in the powerplay as Sri Lanka collapsed to 95 all out.Pakistan and New Zealand are placed second and third respectively, with one point each after their match was washed out due to rain. Sri Lanka sit bottom of the group with a NRR of -2.550.The race for the semi-finals is well and truly underway.
Article Summary: The super 8 stage of the t20 world cup has begun with dramatic shifts in momentum. West indies hold the top spot after a commanding 107-run win over zimbabwe. South africa now occupy the second spot following a commanding 76-run victory over defending champions india. England lead the standings after a 51- run victory over sri lanka in pallekele.

Article Title: NFL Mock Draft 2026 Round 1: Players selected for Las Vegas Raiders, New Orleans Saints, Dallas Cowboys, and Houston Texans
Article Text:
NFL Mock Draft 2026 Round 1: Players selected for Las Vegas Raiders, New Orleans Saints, Dallas Cowboys, and Houston Texans (Image via Getty [clockwise]: Las Vegas Raiders logo, Dallas Cowboys logo, Houston Texans logo, New Orleans Saints logo)

First round picks include Fernando Mendoza for Raiders and Mansoor Delane for Cowboys

NFL Mock Round 1 picks for Texans

NFL Mock first round picks for Cowboys

NFL Mock Round 1 picks for Saints

NFL Mock first round picks for Raiders

NFL Draft 2026 Round 1 is scheduled for April 23 in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. The Las Vegas Raiders have the No. 1 overall pick, and the New Orleans Saints have the No. 8 pick for Round 1.Jerry Jones’ Dallas Cowboys have two first-round picks at No. 12 and No. 20 [acquired through the Micah Parsons trade to the Green Bay Packers]. Cal McNair’s Houston Texans have a first-round pick at No. 28.NFL Mock Draft 2026 Round 1 may feature quarterback Fernando Mendoza of the Indiana Hoosiers for the Las Vegas Raiders. Wide receiver Makai Lemon of the USC Trojans could go to the New Orleans Saints. Cornerback Mansoor Delane of the LSU Tigers may be picked by the Dallas Cowboys. Running back Jadarian Price of Notre Dame Fighting Irish could join the Houston Texans.ESPN’s Mel Kiper Jr. has listed Mendoza as a Round 1 pick for Tom Brady’s part-owned franchise because Geno Smith’s trade after Derek Carr left for New Orleans did not solve Las Vegas’s QB issues. Their new head coach, Super Bowl LX winner Klint Kubiak, wants a signal caller to build his offense around.Kiper Jr. said Makai Lemon would be a productive player for quarterback Tyler Shough in Shough’s second year with the Saints.The Trojans’ wideout attacks the ball in the air. And he collected 1,156 yards in 2025.Coming to Dallas, Mansoor Delane of LSU can shut down opposing receivers and make plays on the ball. He broke up 11 passes and had two interceptions in 2025.Jadarian Price of Notre Dame is perfect for Houston because he is a powerful runner who plays a one-cut-and-go style. In 2025, he had 11 rushing touchdowns, caught two touchdown passes, and scored twice on kickoff returns.Alabama Crimson Tide offensive tackle Kadyn Proctor [NFL Network]Texans Longhorns linebacker Anthony Hill Jr. [Sports Illustrated].Texans A&M linebacker Taurean York [The Landry Hat]Auburn Tigers defensive tackle Keldric Faulk [The Athletic].Ohio State Buckeyes linebacker Alex “Sonny” Styles [Sports Illustrated]Notre Dame Fighting Irish running back Jeremiyah Love [Canal Street Chronicles].Penn State Nittany Lions guard Olaivavega “Vega” Ioane [A to Z Sports]Indiana Hoosiers quarterback Fernando Mendoza [CBS Sports].
Article Summary: Nfl mock draft 2026 round 1 may feature quarterback fernando mendoza of the indiana hoosiers for the las vegas raiders. Wide receiver makai lemon of the usc trojans could go to the new orleans saints. Cornerback mansoor delane of the lsu tigers may be picked by the dallas cowboys.

Article Title: College Basketball coaching hot seat: 5 coaches facing uncertain futures ahead of 2026 March Madness
Article Text:
Image via IMAGN

Top 5 college Basketball coaches on hot seat

Adrian Autry - Syracuse

Jeff Capel - Pittsburgh

Kim English - Providence

Bobby Hurley - Arizona State

Porter Moser - Oklahoma

As the regular season nearing its end, the college basketball coaching carousel is beginning to take shape. Several high-major teams are having a hard time deciding who should lead them as the conference championships get closer and their chances of making the NCAA Tournament are on the line. Poor records, lack of postseason success, and growing expectations have placed multiple coaches under pressure heading into March Madness.While some programs may wait until after the tournament to make changes, recent results suggest that uncertainty surrounds several jobs across major conferences. Here’s a look at five coaches whose futures remain unclear.Replacing a legendary figure is never easy, but Adrian Autry has struggled to lift Syracuse back into NCAA Tournament contention. The Orange have endured another disappointing season, including heavy losses against top opponents. Administrative transitions at the university could complicate the timing of any decision, but continued absence from March Madness has intensified pressure on the program to consider a new direction.Jeff Capel’s tenure at Pittsburgh has been defined by inconsistency. Despite reaching the NCAA Tournament once during his time with the program, the Panthers’ recent struggles including a difficult season well below expectations have raised questions about long-term progress.Financial factors, particularly a significant buyout, could influence whether Pittsburgh moves on, but results on the court have kept the spotlight firmly on Capel.Providence entered the season hoping for a step forward, yet close losses and inconsistent performances have produced another frustrating campaign. Kim English has recruited promising young talent, but patience appears to be wearing thin after multiple seasons without significant postseason success. With strong NIL investment and expectations to compete in the Big East, the program could evaluate its options if results do not improve.Bobby Hurley finds himself coaching the final year of his contract without a clear extension in place. Arizona State has not been among the NCAA Tournament contenders this season, leaving uncertainty about the program’s next move. The Sun Devils’ position in a competitive conference and questions about long-term financial commitment add further complexity to Hurley’s situation.Porter Moser guided Oklahoma to the NCAA Tournament last year, but overall conference results during his tenure have remained inconsistent. With a new athletic director in place, the program could choose to make an early leadership change. At the same time, Moser’s experience and previous postseason appearance give him a case to retain the role if the team finishes the season strongly.As March Madness gets closer, coaches often make decisions based on how their teams are doing at the end of the season. Tournament appearances can buy time, but ongoing problems may speed up change. In the next few weeks, we'll find out if these coaches stay in their jobs or join the offseason coaching shuffle. They have to balance expectations, finances, and roster development.
Article Summary: Several high-major teams are having a hard time deciding who should lead them. Poor records, lack of postseason success, and growing expectations have placed multiple coaches under pressure. Here’s a look at five coaches whose futures remain unclear.

Article Title: Milano Cortina Winter Paralympics 2026: From 50th anniversary, Russia’s return, Ukraine’s boycott, to sports and top performers, everything you need to know
Article Text:
Milano Cortina Winter Olympics 2026 (via Getty)

Russia’s return overshadows Winter Paralympics’ 50th anniversary celebration



The Winter Paralympics will celebrate its 50th anniversary in Milan-Cortina from March 6 to March 15. More than 600 athletes from around the world are expected to compete in six sports. The opening ceremony will take place at the historic Arena di Verona, a UNESCO World Heritage site, specially upgraded with wheelchair ramps, accessible toilets and added safety features. The Games also bring major controversy after the return of the Russian flag and national anthem.Ukraine has indicated it will not attend the opening ceremony after the International Paralympic Committee restored Russian national symbols. This decision comes years after Russian athletes were banned following a state-sponsored doping scandal and later restrictions linked to the 2022 invasion of Ukraine. The closing ceremony will be held at the renovated Cortina Curling Stadium, a venue originally used in the 1956 Winter Olympics.The 2026 edition comes 50 years after the first Winter Paralympics in 1976 in Ornskoldsvik, Sweden, where about 200 athletes competed in just two sports.The event has now grown into a large international competition with six disciplines and hundreds of participants. It will also be Italy’s second time hosting the Winter Paralympics, 20 years after Turin 2006.Ukraine’s sports minister explained in a social media message that the country will stay away from the opening ceremony and other official functions in protest of the decision. He indicated Ukraine cannot support celebrations that include Russian national symbols, even though Russian and Belarusian athletes had recently been competing only as neutral individuals without flag or anthem.China enters the Games as a strong favorite after winning a record 61 medals in Beijing four years ago.Several star athletes are expected to draw attention. American Oksana Masters, born in Ukraine, has 14 Winter Paralympic medals and previously won seven medals in seven events in Beijing. Fellow American Brenna Huckaby aims to add to her gold medal tally in Para snowboard. Italy’s Giacomo Bertagnolli hopes for success at home in Para alpine skiing, while Norway’s Jesper Pedersen will again chase multiple medals. In wheelchair curling, China’s Wang Haitao could become the first three-time Paralympic champion in the sport. Ukrainian veteran Oleksandra Kononova also returns despite past injuries.The six sports include Para alpine skiing, Para biathlon, Para cross-country skiing, Para ice hockey, Para snowboard and wheelchair curling. The curling program will feature new mixed team and pairs events.Daily highlights of Winter Paralympics will air on NBC platforms in the United States, while streaming services will carry every event live.
Article Summary: More than 600 athletes from around the world are expected to compete in six sports. Opening ceremony will take place at the historic arena di verona. Games also bring major controversy after the return of the russian flag and national anthem. Ukraine has indicated it will not attend the opening ceremony.

Article Title: Steven Stamkos Trade Rumors: NHL trade rumors: Will Nashville Predators trade star scorer Steven Stamkos before NHL deadline?
Article Text:
Steven Stamkos (via Getty Images)

Playoff push vs. trade value presents defining moment for Nashville Predators’ season



Nashville Predators TRADE Steven Stamkos To Los Angeles Kings? | NHL Trade Rumors

The Nashville Predators are back in action after the Olympic break, and with them comes one of the most intriguing decisions in the NHL: do they make a push for the playoffs or trade away one of the league’s most coveted assets—Steven Stamkos?Despite the rumors, Steven Stamkos is adamant that his priorities have not changed. In a recent interview with The Athletic, the veteran NHL star made it clear that his main concern is helping Nashville win games, not speculating about potential trades. Nevertheless, with the trade deadline rapidly approaching and playoff contenders looking to bolster their scoring, the situation surrounding the veteran forward is rapidly becoming one of the most intriguing storylines in the league.Steven Stamkos’ resurgence is the key reason why his name is at the forefront of trade rumors. However, any potential trade comes with one huge caveat. Steven Stamkos has a full no-movement clause, giving him the ultimate say in whether a trade occurs or not. He even acknowledged this fact, saying he has not been asked to waive the clause and is not spending time thinking about what could potentially happen. This gives the veteran a lot of control over what happens in the next two weeks.As far as the Predators are concerned, this is a tough decision.His $8 million cap hit was once considered a problem, but his goal-scoring has come back around, making the contract much more palatable for teams looking for a short-term boost. With two years left after this season, any team that trades for him is essentially taking a chance that he can continue scoring at a 30-goal pace well into his 30s, a risk some teams may be willing to take to make a playoff run.Meanwhile, in the locker room, the emphasis is still on the bottom line. Unlike a year ago, the Predators are playing important late-season games, just what Stamkos had in mind when he signed his deal. With 25 games left in the season, the Predators’ playoff chances are still alive, and every point may be crucial in determining whether they are buyers, sellers, or hold steady.For Stamkos, at least for now, the message is simple: win games and let the front office take care of the rest. Whether he is still playing in Nashville or is the big fish of the trade deadline, Stamkos’ play down the stretch may have a big impact not only on the Predators’ future but also on the entire NHL playoff race.
Article Summary: Steven stamkos' resurgence is the key reason why his name is at the forefront of trade rumors. Stamkos has a full no-movement clause, giving him the ultimate say in whether a trade occurs or not. With two years left after this season, any team that trades for him is taking a chance that he can continue scoring at a 30-goal pace well into his 30s.

Article Title: Monday Night Raw: Did Offset Distract Kofi Kingston? Grammy-Nominated Artist Plays Key Role in Heated Clash
Article Text:
Did Offset distract Kofi Kingston on Monday Night Raw? (Image Source: X)

How Offset’s ringside interference shifted momentum against Kofi Kingston

Celebrity involvement adds fuel to WWE Monday Night Raw storyline

When Grammy-nominated rapper Offset was thrust directly into a high-profile match at the February 23 episode of WWE Monday Night Raw, fans were treated to an unexpected crossover moment. But what started as a typical celebrity cameo soon turned into an all-out brawl, shaking up a veteran WWE star, Kofi Kingston.The artist’s antics at ringside amid affairs already boiling inside the arena sent things spiraling and ultimately determined the outcome of the match. The dramatic sequence also blurred the line between entertainment and in-ring competition, becoming one of the night’s most talked-about segments.Offset sat ringside to lend support to up-and-coming WWE star Je’Von Evans, before turning heads of both fans and competitors alike. Tensions were high as Kingston’s associates tried to interfere throughout the match. The ringside presence of Xavier Woods and the brash Grayson Waller added layers of distraction, continually breaking Evans’ offensive rhythm.The turning point came after Waller tried to get back into the action.Offset confronted him at ringside, and in a surprising moment, physically hoisted Waller, tossing him over the announce table. The distraction was substantial, forcing Kingston's focus away from the man in front of him and onto the madness outside of the ring.That brief lapse proved costly. Inside the ring, Evans capitalized by hitting his finishing move on Wright to earn the 3-count. Although Evans picked up the official win, it’s easy to argue that Offset’s presence was what ultimately tipped the scales.Surprise celebrity appearances are nothing new to WWE, especially on flagship programming such as WWE Monday Night Raw. But Offset’s physical appearance took this segment beyond a mere cameo. His readiness to confront an active roster member directly inserted an unpredictable element into a storyline.Fans of both parties reacted quickly to the confrontation, with many debating the implications of celebrity involvement in competitive matches. Offset had also established his alignment for the night with pointed remarks about Kingston’s faction earlier in the evening. Once the dust had settled, the segment left questions of whether Offset’s involvement was a one-night spectacle or the beginning of an arc in terms of a greater storyline. With Kingston’s pride wounded, and Evans getting a surge of momentum from a marquee victory, the crossover moment could have ripples for weeks to come, cementing WWE’s strategy of fusing mainstream star power with mat drama so as to keep fans guessing.
Article Summary: Rapper offset was thrust directly into a high-profile match at the february 23 episode of wwe monday night raw. Offset sat ringside to lend support to up-and-coming wwe star je’von evans, before turning heads of both fans and competitors alike. The dramatic sequence blurred the line between entertainment and in-ring competition.

Article Title: Philadelphia Eagles: NFL Combine 2026: A.J. Brown most likely to leave the Philadelphia Eagles after Nick Sirianni makes vague comment
Article Text:
Image - X

"No Guarantees": Nick Sirianni’s Shocking Quote on A.J. Brown’s Future with Eagles



"Will A.J. be here next season? I think we're still in a spot, like, I can't guarantee how anything is going to play out into next season. I’m thinking I’m going to be the coach next season, but you can’t guarantee anything past tomorrow,"

expects

"You go into the league year listening to offers for everything and anything."

The Philadelphia Eagles arrived at the 2026 NFL Combine with one goal: to put the "noise" of a turbulent 2025 season behind them. Instead, head coach Nick Sirianni and GM Howie Roseman might have just turned the volume up. During their Tuesday press conference, both leaders notably refused to guarantee that star wide receiver A.J. Brown would be back in midnight green this season.When asked directly if Brown was a lock for the 2026 roster, Sirianni didn't give the "non-starter" answer fans were hoping for.Sirianni admitted.While he followed up by saying heBrown to stay and that he loves him as a player, the "no guarantee" phrase quickly became the headline heard ‘round Philly.This isn't just standard coach-speak, it’s a reflection of a rocky year. Brown was a lightning rod for drama in 2025, from sideline heated exchanges with Sirianni to openly criticizing the offensive scheme. While he still produced racking up over 1,000 yards and seven touchdowns, the frustration was visible.Howie Roseman, didn't do much to quiet the trade rumors either. Roseman reiterated that "it’s hard to find great players," but he also dropped a classic Howie-ism:He suggested that if a team offers a package the Eagles "didn't anticipate," they’d be doing a disservice to the franchise not to consider it.Trading a superstar like Brown isn't as simple as swapping jerseys. If the Eagles move him before June 1, they would be hit with a massive $40 million dead cap charge. However, if a deal happens after June 1, that number drops significantly, making a mid-summer blockbuster much more plausible. With Brown set to earn a $29 million salary in 2026, the Eagles have to decide if the production outweighs the price tag and the potential for more locker-room tension.For now, the Eagles are saying they want Brown back, but they are also making it clear that they are "always listening." With a new offensive coordinator in Sean Mannion, the team hopes a fresh system will fix the chemistry issues between Brown and Jalen Hurts.But in Philadelphia, where the roster is always in flux, "no guarantees" usually means the moving trucks aren't far away. If a wide receiver-needy team comes calling with a first-round pick and more, A.J. Brown’s time in Philly could be nearing its end.
Article Summary: Philadelphia eagles head coach nick sirianni and gm howie roseman refused to guarantee a.j. Brown would be back this season. Brown was a lightning rod for drama in 2025, racking up over 1,000 yards and seven touchdowns. If the eagles move him before june 1, they would be hit with a massive $40 million dead cap charge.

Article Title: NFL Rumors: Bozeman Leaves as Browns Fans Slam Cabot on Sanders
Article Text:
NFL rumors roundup: Bradley Bozeman walks away as Browns fans torch Mary Kay Cabot over Shedeur Sanders QB talk (Image via Getty)

Bradley Bozeman’s surprise retirement puts the Chargers’ protection plan under the spotlight

Mary Kay Cabot report on Malik Willis and Ty Simpson has Browns fans roasting the messenger and questioning Shedeur Sanders’ job security

An eight-year starter walking away in February is not how the Los Angeles Chargers drew up their offseason. Bradley Bozeman announced his retirement on Instagram on Monday, ending his career at 31 and creating a fresh hole in the middle of an offensive line that was already under review.In Cleveland, the conversation is not about who is leaving but who might be invited in. Mary Kay Cabot reported that the Browns are evaluating Green Bay Packers backup Malik Willis and draft prospect Ty Simpson as options to push Shedeur Sanders, and Browns fans lit up social media the second her story dropped.Bozeman delivered the news himself, telling followers he is “ready for my next chapter” and adding, “This game has given me so much, lessons, lifelong friendships, and memories my family will carry forever.”He leaves after eight seasons with the Baltimore Ravens, Carolina Panthers, and Chargers, having started at both guard and center since entering the league as a sixth-round pick in 2018. Los Angeles signed him in 2024 to help stabilize the interior and extended him in 2025, but his retirement clears roughly $6 million in cap space and reopens a critical spot in front of Justin Herbert just as free agency is about to heat up.The timing matters. Rashawn Slater missed all of 2025 with a torn patellar tendon, Joe Alt finished the year on injured reserve after ankle surgery, and the Chargers’ line was already the focus of every “what went wrong” breakdown after their wild-card exit.Now Jim Harbaugh and new offensive coordinator Mike McDaniel have to solve center before anything else. Tyler Linderbaum will be one of the most talked about names on the market if the Ravens let him get there, and pieces around the league are already connecting him to Los Angeles as an obvious fit. Whether the Chargers go big-game hunting or lean on a cheaper veteran, Bozeman’s decision forces them to show how serious they are about protecting their franchise quarterback.Cabot reported that the Browns have at least two external quarterbacks on their radar: Willis, who flashed as a backup in Green Bay, and Simpson, a projected first-rounder out of Alabama. On paper it looks like smart due diligence for a team that just went 5-12 and still has Deshaun Watson and Dillon Gabriel in the room. In reality, the fanbase went straight for the quote-tweet button.“Don't believe anything MKC says.. she has no clue,” one fan wrote. Another added, “Mary K is all rumors we don’t listen to her goofy ass.” A third summed up the mood with, “Stop this nonsense, Cleveland media doesn’t know shit about fuck.”That pushback lands on top of an already messy context. Sanders threw for 1,400 yards with seven touchdowns in eight starts, made a Pro Bowl on name value and late-season buzz, but also finished near the bottom of the league in most efficiency metrics on a team that collapsed to last place in the AFC North.New head coach Todd Monken has not exactly wrapped his quarterback in bubble wrap either. Asked about the 2026 starter, he told reporters it is “still to be determined” and has been consistent that every spot will be open to competition.If the Browns follow Cabot’s reporting and seriously chase Willis in free agency while holding a first-round ticket on Simpson, Sanders is not just fighting Twitter narratives. He is fighting a depth chart that could very quickly include a new veteran, a premium rookie, and a $230 million former franchise quarterback in Watson all trying to squeeze into the same huddle.
Article Summary: Bradley bozeman’s surprise retirement puts the chargers’ protection plan under the spotlight. Mary kay cabot report on malik willis and ty simpson has browns fans roasting the messenger. Shedeur sanders threw for 1,400 yards with seven touchdowns in eight starts.

Article Title: Is Aaron Rodgers returning to the Steelers? GM Omar Khan provides update on veteran QB
Article Text:
Image via Getty

What did the Steelers say about Aaron Rodgers’ future?

Could Aaron Rodgers join the Vikings for the 2026 season?

Aaron Rodgers’ future has once again become one of the biggest storylines of the NFL offseason. The veteran quarterback is currently a free agent after spending the 2025 season with the Pittsburgh Steelers, uncertainty remains over whether he will return, retire, or explore a new destination.Rodgers helped the Steelers win the AFC North and get to the playoffs, but they lost in the Wild Card round, which was a big disappointment. That result, along with changes in Pittsburgh’s coaching setup, sparked speculation that the four-time MVP could step away from football. However, recent comments from the Steelers’ front office suggest the door remains open for a reunion.Speaking at the 2026 NFL Scouting Combine, Steelers general manager Omar Khan made it clear that the team would welcome Rodgers back. Khan revealed that he has been in contact with the quarterback and expects clarity sooner than last year, when Rodgers’ decision stretched deep into the offseason.Khan said the organisation has communicated its interest in continuing the partnership, especially with Rodgers’ former Green Bay Packers head coach Mike McCarthy now part of the setup. While Rodgers is not currently under contract, the Steelers appear prepared to move forward with him if he chooses to return.Rodgers’ 2025 numbers showed he can still be productive. He threw 65.7 percent of his passes for 3,322 yards, with 24 touchdowns and seven interceptions. This helped Pittsburgh have a great regular-season record. But the loss in the playoffs showed how bad the offense was, which made the team realize that they need to look about the future at quarterback.Khan also said that Pittsburgh is still looking for its next franchise quarterback. The Steelers have a lot of draft picks and younger players like Will Howard on their roster, so Rodgers might be seen as a short-term fix instead of a long-term answer.While Pittsburgh remains the most logical landing spot, other teams are monitoring the situation. The Minnesota Vikings have been a possible destination, especially because young quarterback J.J. McCarthy hasn't been steady this season.Reports suggest Rodgers previously had interest in Minnesota, and the team could consider adding a veteran to compete for the starting role. The Vikings’ strong offensive weapons, including star receivers, make the roster an attractive option for a quarterback looking to contend.NFL insiders believe Minnesota may provide the biggest competition to Pittsburgh if Rodgers decides to continue playing. The decision could depend on how comfortable the Vikings are bringing in a high-profile veteran alongside a developing young quarterback.For now, the Steelers remain optimistic but patient. Rodgers’ choice will not only shape Pittsburgh’s offseason plans but could also influence the wider quarterback market across the league. As free agency approaches, clarity on the veteran’s future is expected sooner rather than later.
Article Summary: Aaron rodgers is currently a free agent after spending the 2025 season with the pittsburgh steelers. The four-time mvp has been linked with a move to the minnesota vikings. However, steelers general manager omar khan said the team would welcome rodgers back for the 2026 season.

Article Title: “I didn’t have successful relationships”: Kayla Nicole hints at Travis Kelce allegedly cheating on her ahead of his wedding to Taylor Swift
Article Text:
Kayla Nicole hints at Travis Kelce’s alleged cheating before their breakup ahead of his wedding to Taylor Swift.(Image via Getty Images)

Kayla Nicole might have just called Travis Kelce a “cheater” as Taylor Swift stays silent



Travis Kelce has been a perfect man to Taylor Swift as Kayla Nicole continues to troll them



Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce might be keeping things private about their lives but the star player’s ex girlfriend, Kayla Nicole, has continued to be in the headlines for her controversial comments.When Travis Kelce and Kayla Nicole went their separate ways in 2022, neither of them spoke about the reason behind such a decision. But now, the popular social media influencer has dropped hints about what might have happened.A few months ago, Kayla Nicole opened up about her personal life on her podcast, The Pre Game, where she said, “In my experience, I don’t have successful, monogamous relationships without any element of cheating…”While she did not name Travis Kelce, Kayla Nicole added, "It can be overwhelming…”The popular social media influencer continued, “It's hard to go into new relationships without the mindset of, 'I probably am going to get cheated on' ... or, 'I'm probably going to be cheated on, everything that this person is telling me might be a lie.'"This comment of Kayla Nicole’s has raised eyebrows as many feel that there might have been some infidelity on Travis Kelce’s part when the two were in a public on off relationship from 2017 to 2022.However, neither Travis Kelce nor Taylor Swift has reacted to these controversial comments.While Kayla Nicole has made many digs at the Kansas City Chiefs’ star player, Travis Kelce has turned into a perfect boyfriend and soon to be husband for the billionaire pop star, Taylor Swift.Over the last two years, Taylor Swift has constantly praised Travis Kelce in public for how loving and supporting he has been throughout her Eras Tour and beyond.Pictures and videos of Travis Kelce being a perfect gentleman for the billionaire pop star, Taylor Swift, has also turned him into a fan favorite.Now, as Taylor Swift and Travis Kelce gear up for one of the biggest and most exciting chapters of their lives, all eyes are on how they are planning their lavish wedding.However, though their high profile relationship has always been in the public eye, neither Taylor Swift nor Travis Kelce have revealed any minute detail about their wedding yet.As of now, there are reports of it being a destination wedding in Italy and how guests have signed NDAs but nothing has been confirmed yet.
Article Summary: Kayla nicole hints at travis kelce’s alleged cheating before their breakup ahead of his wedding to taylor swift. The popular social media influencer has dropped hints about what might have happened. While kayla nicole has made many digs at the kansas city chiefs’ star player,ravis kelce has turned into a perfect boyfriend and soon to be husband for the billionaire pop star.

Article Title: Olympian Chloe Kim makes a heartbreaking confession about battling an eating disorder as Myles Garrett stands by her side
Article Text:
Olympian Chloe Kim opens up about past eating disorder as boyfriend Myles Garrett stands by her side.(Image via Getty Images)

Olympian Chloe Kim shares about an eating disorder she faced amid her high profile romance with Myles Garrett



Myles Garrett has turned into a supportive boyfriend for Olympian Chloe Kim



Olympian Chloe Kim and her boyfriend, the Cleveland Browns’ star player, Myles Garrett, have turned into a fan favorite couple with the whole world rooting for them.Just days after Chloe Kim won a silver medal at the 2026 Winter Olympics, Myles Garrett gifted her a vintage car worth a whopping $100,000. While things seem great in Chloe Kim’s life, it was always not like this.A few months ago, Olympian Chloe Kim appeared on the What Shapes Us podcast where she opened up about a pretty dark chapter in her life.As Chloe Kim went through COVID-19, it had a pretty negative impact on her life as she also focused on prepping for the 2022 Winter Olympics.Chloe Kim reflected on it as she opened up about battling a “low-key an eating disorder…”The now three time Olympian added, “Then I was like, OK, I think I need to go to therapy, because I’m actually, like, crashing out bad, like, next thing, you know, I don’t know what’s going to happen to me.”The two gold medalist continued, “So I started going to therapy…At first, I thought it was really stupid, but I was, to be quite honest, I was just desperate for something and hoping that she could help. And she did.”Despite going through a pretty tough time, things eventually worked out for Chloe Kim as she ended up winning gold for the second time in her life at the 2022 Winter Olympics.Soon after, the 25 year old Olympian crossed paths with the Cleveland Browns’ star player, Myles Garrett, and the two fell deeply in love.Throughout the last few months, as Chloe Kim prepped aggressively for the 2026 Winter Olympics, Myles Garrett was there by her side as he kept supporting and motivating her.Myles Garrett was also spotted in Switzerland as he flew there to be by her side when she sustained a shoulder injury last month.Later, as Chloe Kim participated in the 2026 Winter Olympics, Myles Garrett continued to cheer her on and even posted about how proud he was of her achievements.It seems the power couple are deeply in love and might make plans about their future soon even though nothing has been confirmed yet.
Article Summary: Olympian chloe kim opens up about past eating disorder as boyfriend myles garrett stands by her side. The two gold medalist opened up about battling a “low-key an eating disorder…” the 25-year-old olympian crossed paths with the cleveland browns’ star player and the two fell deeply in love.

for the’ game against the Indiana Pacers on February 24, 2026, at Gainbridge Fieldhouse. The game is scheduled to start at 7:00 PM ET.He has not played since February 7. The team has been managing his right knee, and he is also dealing with soreness in his right shin. With the Sixers at 31-26 and still fighting for playoff position, his availability is an important factor for this game.Joel Embiid’s current status is tied to ongoing management of his right knee. The shin soreness, which showed up again after the All-Star break, has added to the concern.The Sixers have taken a careful approach because of his past knee injuries, including meniscus issues. He has been going through treatment and has done some work on the court, but there is no final decision yet. Like several games this season, his status is expected to be decided close to tip-off.With Embiid out, the team has relied more on Tyrese Maxey and Quentin Grimes. Adem Bona and Trendon Watford have handled frontcourt minutes in his absence.Indiana is also dealing with multiple injuries. Bennedict Mathurin and Jarace Walker are expected to take on bigger roles.What it means for the gameEmbiid’s status affects how this game is expected to play out. The Sixers are favored by around 9.5 to 10 points, with the total set near 233.5.If he plays, Philadelphia gets a clear advantage inside against a short-handed Pacers frontcourt. If he sits, the offense will again run more through Maxey, with more responsibility on the guards.Also read: Philadelphia 76ers vs Indiana Pacers injury report: Who's playing, injured and questionable players, head-to-head records, team stats, and more (February 24, 2026) The final call on Embiid is likely to come shortly before the game starts.
Article Summary: Joel embiid has not played since february 7. The team has been managing his right knee, and he is also dealing with soreness in his right shin. He has been going through treatment and has done some work on the court, but there is no final decision yet. His availability is an important factor for this game.
